metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15888 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Lua through 5.4.0 mishandles the interaction between stack resizes and garbage collection, leading to a heap-based buffer overflow, heap-based buffer over-read, or use-after-free.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> couldn't reproduce on lua earlier than 5.4. No indication that earlier versions are vulnerable. Marking not-affected.

criterions.comment: lua50: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
